page.title: 06Kingswood Health Centre
page.content: The Health Centre is the primary source of{health care and treatment for the local area.Weekdays it is open 8.30-7.00, on Saturday 9-10.30a.m. Looking after registered patients are 5{General Practitioners.}They provide medical care, immunisations (tetanus, diphtheria, polio, whooping cough), baby development check, anti/post natal care or family planning.A Treatmentroom Nurse assists doctor, 6 District{Nurses}give treatment in homes of elderly, handicapped, chronic sick, and 5{Health Visitors}check the progress of the Under 5's. Part of 200 staff are 2{Nursing Auxiliaries,}2 {Midwives,}2{Dentists,}2{Speech {Therapists,}1{Chiropodist}and 8 {Receptionists.}The Centre, being local offers quick treatment and friendly service.But as yet there is no Xray/blood/water test equipment.
